trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled" /> .

trans-unit.source: When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando um serviço que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> classe encontra uma exceção não pode tratar, ele pode chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> método para informar o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho para gerar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O serviço é aprovado a <xref:System.Guid> da instância do fluxo de trabalho e o <xref:System.Exception> associado ao evento na chamada de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho encapsula esses parâmetros em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> e gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: De dentro de um assinante para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, você pode ler o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> propriedade para obter as informações associadas a um determinado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que não pôde ser tratada pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que representa a exceção que não pôde ser tratada pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância de fluxo de trabalho associada à exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> da instância de fluxo de trabalho associada à exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> é equivalente ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada com o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> evento.
